donate.title: Donate for development of the project
donate.description: TXD is developing innovative tools for scooter vinyl design. Your donations support new models, templates, and features that make customization easier and more accessible.

step1.title: Creative / Reference Upload
step1.description: Provide your brief or upload a reference design. AI generation options available.

step2.title: Prepayment
step2.description: A portion of the cost is paid upfront to begin production.

step3.title: Printing
step3.description: Premium vinyl is printed with your design on cover-sets.

step4.title: Delivery
step4.description: Complete kits are shipped directly to your address.

step5.title: Installation
step5.description: Install via your own contractor, local service, or DIY.

durability.question: How durable are the vinyl wraps?
durability.answer: Our premium vinyl wraps are designed to last 3-5 years with proper care. They are UV-resistant and weatherproof.

quality.question: What quality of film do you use?
quality.answer: We use premium-grade vinyl films from leading manufacturers, ensuring vibrant colors and long-lasting durability.

installation.question: Can I install it myself?
installation.answer: Yes, our kits come with detailed instructions. However, professional installation is recommended for best results.

shipping.question: Do you ship internationally?
shipping.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide. Shipping costs and times vary by location.

custom.question: How long does a custom design take?
custom.answer: Custom designs typically take 5-7 business days for design approval, plus production and shipping time.

step2.description: Select your preferred date and location. We come to you - home, office, or anywhere convenient.

step3.title: Professional Wrapping
step3.description: Our certified specialists apply premium 3M vinyl with precision. Quality guaranteed.

step4.title: Ride in Style
